Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: At the ministerial meeting , trade ministers will review the work of the WTO and the implementation of the Uruguay Round free trade commitments under its predecessor the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade ( GATT ) .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Let's identify the "Organization" entities in the given paragraph:

1. WTO (World Trade Organization) - This is an international organization that deals with global trade rules between nations.

2. GATT (General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade) - This is the predecessor of the WTO and was an international agreement that regulated international trade and reduced tariffs.

So, the "Organization" entities in the paragraph are WTO and GATT.
